Text:
●Guard parry
When guarding (hold ∈＋∋)
If you shake the Wii Remote at the precise moment
parry will happen
allowing for a counterattack


●Clash
If your and your enemy's melee attack meet
a contest of strength will occur.
Keep swinging the Wii Remote
to win the clash

We have successfully acquired the enemy's Mobile Suit.
You can use it as a weapon for your own unit in the future.

We have successfully acquired an enemy MS (Mobile Suit).
Since it is already deployed to our own unit,
we will provide it to the research facility.

You have obtained a weapon.
You can use it in the next battle.

You have acquired an enemy weapon.
Select an item to take back to your unit.

Amuro Ray, a civilian boy, gets caught up in the war and
grows tremendously as a Gundam pilot.

Shiro Amada, commander of the 08th MS Platoon..
Questions army's methods and pursues his own path.

Lines: Federal Forces test pilot Christina Mackenzie heads out
in new Gundam she is testing against an enemy attack

Text:
Yuu Kajima, the pilot of an experimental aircraft equipped 
with the mysterious 'EXAM' system roams the battlefield as the 'Blue Grim Reaper'

Char Aznable was feared as Zeon's Red Comet. 
An encounter with Gundam changes his fate...

Ramba Ral, also known as the 'Blue Giant'. 
Receiving a special mission to avenge Garma Zabi, 
he lays ambush for Gundam.

Gaia is the leader of a unit feared as the Black Tri-Star.
Descending to the ground to defeat the White Base team.

Norris Packard is an ace of the Far East Army
 serving Sakhalin family.
With his outstanding combat sense, he fights to overcome the situation.

Lines: Bernard Wiseman is a new soldier in the Cyclops Team. He carries
out the mission to destroy the new Gundam with determination.

Text:
Akahana of the Mad Angler Corps commanded by Char.
Riding an Acguy, he attempts sabotage inside Jaburo.
Adjust brightness so that both A and E are visible
'A ruthless snowfield that covers even death.'
The sound of waves cannot be heard far away.

Select the Federation Army or Zeon Army
and play the original story.

Play as ace pilots from both sides.
You can relive famous encounters with ace pilots.

Ace pilots will teach you the basics of the game.
If you learn them properly, you will be able to master combat.

Compete against another player. To play 'VS 2P and 'VS TAG'
Open the HOME button menu and have 2P recognized.

3 minute score attack
VS 2P Two players can compete.

Play original missions cooperatively with 2P.
Let's fight in harmony with each other.

View the details of the acquired MS and paint it.
You can also check the score record of each mission.
Adjust the sound, screen, and rumble.

Change the cost limit.
Choose from 300/450/600/unlimited.

Change your thinking type.
There are 4 levels: Easy/Medium/Hard/Ace.

Change your handicap.
You can adjust the durability of your MS (Mobile Suit).
